DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; VIETNAM ; FLOODS KILLS 172 ; MILLION LEAVE HOME
DOC.TEXT: Floods_in Vietnam ' s biggest rice-growing region have killed 172 people and driven about 1 million people from their homes , a government official said . Floods_in the southern region known as the Plain of Reeds began in late June , but the full scope of the disaster only emerged in the last few days .
